title: [Rumor Woods, Anvil Strip]
description: Blasts of heat rush outside of a large, open-air forge, the thunderous sounds of hammer and anvil filling the area.  Gold and hunter green pennants are tied to posts sunk into the soft ground, each surrounded by a diverse lot of saddled horses patiently awaiting their riders' return.  In between two canvas tents, a halfling perches on an overturned crate, polishing a pair of riding boots.

Blasts of heat rush outside of a large, open-air forge, the thunderous sounds of hammer and anvil filling the area.  Platinum and red pennants are tied to posts sunk into the soft ground, each surrounded by a diverse lot of saddled horses patiently awaiting their riders' return.  In between two canvas tents, a halfling perches on an overturned crate, polishing a pair of riding boots.

Blasts of heat rush outside of a large, open-air forge, the thunderous sounds of hammer and anvil filling the area.  Blue and gold pennants are tied to posts sunk into the soft ground, each surrounded by a diverse lot of saddled horses patiently awaiting their riders' return.  In between two canvas tents, a halfling perches on an overturned crate, polishing a pair of riding boots.
paths: Obvious paths: east, southeast, south, southwest
